page.title: 19UPEND VILLAGE.
page.content: There are 17 buildings in Upend village, mostly pink and white old thatched cottages. {Estimated age of buildings:}11 old, 2 new and 4 in between.{Roof Materials 7 thatch, 4 slate, 5 tiled, 1 corrugated metal.{House Colours:}2 red 2 light pink, 3 cream, 4 pink, 2 pink+ red and 4 white.{Wall Materials:}2 brick,1 plaster,3 wattle&daub,2 plaster,brick&wood,3 brick,flint & plaster,2 wattle&daub+brick, 1plaster& stone. The{River Kennett}runs through Upend. The land is overgrown with trees and nettles. We estimated that the river was 3 to 3\m wide. We measured the depth more easily, using string tied to a weight. We made a mark where the water came to and measured it. The river was 24cm deep at the deepest point.
